intern.statement: Very basic understanding of React and ability to build an app. Productive 3 hours a day.

Junior Dev.statement: Basic understanding of React and abilities. Productive 5 hours a day.
Basic understanding of React and abilities; can build a component. Productive 5 hours a day.
Basic understanding of React and abilities; can build an app. Productive 5 hours a day.

Mid-Level Dev.statement: Mid-Level understanding of React and abilities; can build an app. Productive 7 hours a day.
Mid-Level understanding of React and abilities; can build & maintain an app. Productive 7 hours a day.
Mid-Level understanding of React and abilities; can build, maintain, and debug an app. Productive 7 hours a day.

Senior Dev.statement: Senior understanding of React and abilities; can build, maintain, and debug an app, and supervise mid-levels. Productive 8 or more hours a day.
Senior understanding of React and abilities; can build, maintain, and debug an app, and supervise mid-levels as well as juniors. Productive 8 or more hours a day.
Senior understanding of React and abilities; can build, maintain, and debug an app, and supervise mid-levels, juniors, and other seniors. Productive 8 or more hours a day.
